test.name: Verify Post Dynamic Data Contains Url

kw.name: Post Dynamic Data
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:8086/delay/2 path_url=/delay/2 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'accept': 'application/json', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

POST Response : url=http://localhost:8086/delay/2 status=200, reason=OK headers={'Server': 'gunicorn/19.9.0', 'Date': 'Wed, 11 Jan 2023 03:03:23 GMT', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '365', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*', 'Access-Control-Allow-Credentials': 'true'} body={ "args": {}, "data": "", "files": {}, "form": {}, "headers": { "Accept": "application/json", "Accept-Encoding": "gzip, deflate", "Connection": "keep-alive", "Content-Length": "0", "Host": "localhost:8086", "User-Agent": "python-requests/2.28.1" }, "origin": "172.17.0.1", "url": "http://localhost:8086/delay/2" }
